name: Street Surveillance Technologies (2021)
description: Object detection, pose estimation, & face detection of footage of BLM & HK protests, & archival Black Panther footage serve as an example of what government agency surveillance systems are technically capable of seeing. This artwork serves to remind protestors to cover their face during demonstrations. https://bit.ly/3slyrT2 This artwork was donated by @violet_forest to help raise money for protestors in Colombia. â€”> https://bit.ly/3h1Uk7J  100% of the proceeds will go to https://bit.ly/3haO9i1
